## Library loading

```{r}
library(GEOquery)
```

## Running Code

Downloading of all the data we need.

```{r}

gse <- getGEO("GSE54514", GSEMatrix = TRUE)

# If multiple platforms, take the first one
gse <- gse[[1]]

# Inspect
exprs_data <- exprs(gse)
pheno_data <- pData(gse)
feature_data <- fData(gse)

```
